DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/mtls_certi.description: Deletes the mTLS certificate unless the certificate is in use by one or more Cloudflare services.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

ca.description: Indicates whether the certificate is a CA or leaf certificate.

issuer.description: The certificate authority that issued the certificate.

name.description: Optional unique name for the certificate. Only used for human readability.

signature.description: The type of hash used for the certificate.

uploaded_on.description: This is the time the certificate was uploaded.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/mtls_certific.description: Lists all mTLS certificates uploaded to your account, such as Bring Your Own CA (BYO-CA) for mTLS. To list certificates issued by the Cloudflare managed CA, use the [List Client Certificates endpoint](/api/resources/client_certificates/methods/list/).

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/mtls_certific.description: Fetches a single mTLS certificate uploaded to your account. To get a certificate issued by the Cloudflare managed CA, use the [Client Certificate Details endpoint](/api/resources/client_certificates/methods/get/).

GET /accounts/{account_id}/mtls_certific.description: Lists all active associations between the certificate and Cloudflare services.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: List mTLS certificate associations response failure

POST /accounts/{account_id}/mtls_certifi.description: Upload a certificate that you want to use with mTLS-enabled Cloudflare services, such as Bring Your Own CA (BYO-CA) for mTLS. To create certificates issued by the Cloudflare managed CA, use the [Create Client Certificate endpoint](/api/resources/client_certificates/methods/create/).

ca.description: Indicates whether the certificate is a CA or leaf certificate.

name.description: Optional unique name for the certificate. Only used for human readability.

private_key.description: The private key for the certificate. This field is only needed for specific use cases such as using a custom certificate with Zero Trust's block page.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

ca.description: Indicates whether the certificate is a CA or leaf certificate.

issuer.description: The certificate authority that issued the certificate.

name.description: Optional unique name for the certificate. Only used for human readability.

signature.description: The type of hash used for the certificate.

updated_at.description: This is the time the certificate was updated.

uploaded_on.description: This is the time the certificate was uploaded.
